alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Freestone; Henderson; Leon (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 2:52AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Freestone, northeastern Leon, southeastern Henderson and Anderson Counties through 345 AM CST... At 252 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Edom to Harmony to Buffalo. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Palestine and Montalba around 255 AM CST. Frankston, Berryville, and Lake Palestine around 300 AM CST. Elkhart around 310 AM CST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Tucker, Bradford, Flo, Bois D`arc, Oakwood, Poynor, Redtown, Corinth, Tennessee Colony, and New York. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 168 and 175. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central Texas.
